title: Crowbar Nurse - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Horror   Romance   Sci-fi   Shoujo   Supernatural
tags: Depictions of Cruelty   Female Protagonist   Glasses-wearing Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Multiple Transported Individuals   Otome Game   Transported into a Game World   Zombies
author: threehyphens
description: The overworked nurse was moments away from dropping dead from exhaustion when suddenly, she found herself trapped in a once-popular zombie video game. But somehow, a character from a dating sim rescues her. They team up to reach the end of the game so that everyone can make it out alive.>
